meanings.definition: In a manner that is obsessively focused on a single idea or subject.
meanings.sent1: She monomaniacally talked about her favorite TV show all day long.
meanings.sent2: He worked monomaniacally on perfecting his painting skills.
meanings.sent3: The cat monomaniacally chased its tail in circles, never getting tired of the game.
meanings.sent4: Her mind raced monomaniacally, fixated on solving the puzzle before anyone else.
meanings.sent5: The clock ticked monomaniacally, echoing through the empty room.

meanings.definition: With an intense and singular focus on one particular thing.
meanings.sent1: The detective monomaniacally pursued every lead to solve the case.
meanings.sent2: She monomaniacally trained for the marathon, determined to finish strong.
meanings.sent3: The chef monomaniacally added more and more spices to the dish, hoping for the perfect flavor.
meanings.sent4: His heart beat monomaniacally as he approached the stage to give his speech.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed monomaniacally against the shore, never ceasing their relentless rhythm.
